data.actual_result: filter is broken and doesn't return messages from the user, but will search for any messages with the username as text, if there are any
data.expected_result: search works and returns messages from specified user
data.short_description: Searching for someone with # at the beginning of their username with the from filter breaks it
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a server where someone has a username that begins with a # (can't be just a nickname) - Search for messages from them with the from: filter
